member.name: MIB_MFE_STATS_TABLE
member.summary: TheMIB_MFE_STATS_TABLE structure stores statistics for a group of Multicast Forwarding Entries (MFEs).

member.name: MIB_MFE_STATS_TABLE.dwNumEntries
member.summary: The number of MFEs in the array.

member.name: MIB_MFE_STATS_TABLE.table
member.summary: A pointer to a table of MFEs that are implemented as an array of structures.
